about_the_game:
The 5th edition of SEGA Make War Not Love campaign was a great success, and players were able to unlock an additionnal - and free - new content to Endless Space 2.



In the free "Guardians & the Galaxy" Update, you will investigate a massive Unfallen merging phenomenon and try to understand this curious population behaviour...

Content:

  • Population Quest
  • New Foolhardy Haroshem hero
  • In-game clock
  • Empire improvement
  • Diplomacy contextual effect

short_description: The free "Guardians and the Galaxy" Update features a foolhardy Haroshem Hero, an intriguing quest where you will investigate a massive Unfallen merging phenomenon, the introduction of an in-game clock, and several other improvements.
